info.title: ACORD Life & Annuity REST API
info.description: Contains many API endpoints for ACORD L&A rest APIs.Bank Information Inquiry tc=230

get.summary: Bank Information Inquiry tc=230 - Transaction sub type 23000 Bank Routing Inquiry is used to perform a bank routing validation
get.description: Bank Information Inquiry is used to perform validation of bank information.The response transaction would include a message that the routing numbers are valid or invalid.

get.summary: Bank Information Inquiry tc=230 - Transaction sub type 23001 is used to validate a clientâ€™s bank account information for an electronic funds transfer using a combination of the bank routing number and the specific bank account number.
get.description: Bank Information Inquiry is used to perform validation of bank information.The response transaction would include a message that the combination of routing number and account number is valid or invalid.
